response.overview: Little is known about this mysterious film, whose director and exact date remain unknown; indeed, since the title card is missing, even the real title is unknown, and the designation Chaplin and Coogan is a tentative one. The film was made some time during the 1920s, evidently after Chaplin made The Kid (1921), in which he played opposite child star Jackie Coogan.
response.title: Chaplin and Coogan
